A

About - Class in <Unnamed>
Creates an about dialog that will display information about the programmers of Tetristry.
About() - Constructor for class About
Constructor calls the method to create the dialog.
aboutDialog() - Method in class About
This method creates and sets up the about dialog.The buttons and logo are read in from an image file.
aboutItem - Static variable in class TetristryApp
Allows access to JMenuItem methods.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class About
Implemented abstract method that closes the dialog when the continue button is clicked, through an if statement.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class GameBoard
Implemented abstract method that processes ActionEvents.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class HighScore
Implemented abstract method that prints the highscore or returns to menu based on the button that is clicked, through and if statement.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class Instructions
Implemented abstract method that moves user to next page of instructions or back to main menu based on if statements.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class LevelSelection
Implemented abstract method that stores the current difficulty based on user's selection, through an if statement, and opens a player name dialog box.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class Menu
Uses action listener to check if one of the buttons are pressed and performs the action assosiated with it.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class PlayerName
Uses action listener to check if one of the buttons are pressed and performs the action assosiated with it.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class TetristryApp
The actionPerformed method calls methods based on the menubar choices clicked by the user through an if statement.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class Time
Uses action listener to continous display the updated time to the player.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class Tutorial
Uses action listener to check if one of the buttons are pressed and performs the action assosiated with it.
addBarriers(int, int, int, int) - Method in class GameBoard
This method adds two elements barriers by the passed in co-ordinates.
addNotify() - Method in class GameBoard
This method focuses the Key Listener on the panel.
askCompound() - Method in class GameBoard
This method asks the user to name the compound formed.
askingCompound - Variable in class GameBoard
boolean variable to store whether the game is asking the user to name a compound.
